resources.string: is allows you to make posts on the wall of several messengers at once. A little about the mechanics:
- Click on the \"Logout\" button to open a panel and select messengers from which you can exit.
- Click on the \"Connect\" button to open a panel and select messengers that can be connected.
- Click on the \"Post\" button to open a panel to select messengers to which you can send your post.
- Click on the \"Add image\" button to attach photos from the gallery to your post.
- Click on the \"Warning\" button to report the problem.
Please let me know if you find any error in my application. You can inform me about it by email:
Looks like uou are not logged in. Please, log in using one of the presented messengers.
Official Facebook methods doesn\'t\ allow to send more than 6 photos at once. If you\'l\l choose more, Crossposter will forced to use
